criterion: Provides overly complicated or professional medical information
Incorrectly states that high blood pressure can be treated with lifestyle changes alone
Asks follow-up questions to clarify user's concerns and health history
Correctly advises seeking medical attention if blood pressure readings are consistently high

Advises the user to consult a doctor before starting any medication

Incorrectly advises the user to ignore their blood pressure reading if it is borderline

Fails to address the user's concern about medication
